channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gavin Newsom Prepares to Sue Trump to Keep the LA Riots Going
Republican rep indicates he's 'a no' on Trump-backed rescissions measure
item.description: Republican Rep. Don Bacon told the New York Times that he has has indicated he's "a no" on the rescissions measure Trump wants Congress to pass.

item.title: GOP leadership unleashes fury on Dem governor ahead of blockbuster congressional hearing
item.description: GOP Whip Tom Emmer slammed Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz ahead of a major committee hearing set to take place this week.

item.title: Press Gaslighting on Los Angeles Riots Reaches an Astoundingly Disturbing New Low
Senate Faces Challenges in Passing Tax-Cut Bill
item.description: A multitude of issues reportedly remain before Republican senators agree on their version of the "one big, beautiful bill" of tax cuts and spending.

item.title: 'Homeland would've been stolen': AK Natives sound off on Biden energy bans as Trump officials tour tundra
item.description: Kaktovik, Alaska, resident thanks president for blocking environmental groups while Energy Secretary Chris Wright highlights untapped potential.

item.title: Monday Morning Minute: Sovereignty Beats Journalism
